items.sentence: I don\'t like fish very much and hardly ever eat it.
What\'s your favorite thing to do in your free time?
Tom told his children that Santa Claus wasn\'t real.
You might be the only one here who can speak French.
How do you think humans are going to become extinct?
How has your life changed over the last three years?
How long did you think the picnic was going to last?
I didn\'t feel like getting out of bed this morning.
Tom came into the room, carrying a bunch of flowers.
Tom came out of the house with his hands in the air.
What\'s happening to you has already happened to me.
Tom couldn\'t remember where he\'d put his umbrella.
I don\'t know how many brothers and sisters Tom has.
Tom said he\'d be disappointed if we couldn\'t come.
You should probably tell Tom where to put the tools.
Tom sat on the pier, dangling his feet in the water.
Tom very often makes mistakes when he speaks French.
I wonder whether or not Tom has ever been to Boston.
I have no idea what we\'re supposed to do right now.
I haven\'t yet bought all the textbooks that I need.
